resources.string: Which planet is the largest in our solar system?
Which planet has the most moons?
Jupiter is the largest planet, with a diameter of about 140,000 km.
Saturn has 82 known moons, more than any other planet in the solar system.
Mercury is the smallest planet, only slightly larger than Earth\'s moon.
